A different kind of school

Bluestem's mission is to foster creativity, independence, and ingenuity by providing a child-centric learning environment, hands-on activities, and integration with the community.

Our central location will allow children to learn about and experience their city. Our committment to the environment and nature will teach children to love and protect their world.

Opening for the 2017-18 school year, Bluestem will be centrally located, and with the help of the Lincoln community, will offer generous scholarships to make this wonderful educational opportunity available to all.
